Moments from the buzz of Centreway in the very heart of Keilor East, this modern side-by-side residence delivers a lifestyle of low-maintenance perfection with its floorplan flexibility, long list of features and terrific living/entertaining spaces both inside and out. Beautifully appointed, the home's immaculate interior comprises three main bedrooms (extra-large master with WIR and private ensuite), along with a study/home office (or fourth bedroom), stylish central bathroom and guest powder room (third WC).
